submission.title: How to Submit an Event
submission.p1: To publish an event on our site, you must be a registered user. The process is simple:
submission.step1: Click the 'Submit Event' button in the site header.
submission.step2: Fill out the form with all the necessary information about your event.
submission.step3: After submission, your event will be sent for moderation.

moderation.title: Moderation Rules
moderation.p1: All submitted events are reviewed by an administrator. Moderation usually takes up to 24 hours.
moderation.forbidden_item2: Advertising for financial services, political or religious organizations.

promotion.title: Premium Promotion
promotion.p1: To highlight your event, use the 'Premium Promotion' service. Paid events are displayed at the very top of the main page. The service is activated instantly after payment. You can manage the promotion in the <1>My Events</1> section of your profile.
promotion.p2: Premium events are sorted among themselves by the event date (the earliest first).
